title: Inflation rate in Dominican Republic 2024
yAxis: Inflation rate compared to previous year
summary: Overall Inflation rate compared to previous year has increased over the Year.

Inflation rate compared to previous year is roughly constant from 1996 to 2002, rapidly increasing from 2002 to 2003, slightly decreasing from 2003 to 2004, slightly increasing from 2004 to 2005, and finally roughly constant from 2005 to 2007.

The line rapidly increased by 425.86% from Year 2002 to 2003,increased by 87.47% from Year 2003 to 2004,decreased by 91.86% from Year 2004 to 2005, and lastly, increased by 80.67% from Year 2005 to 2006.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2004 and 2005.
Maximum Inflation rate compared to previous year, about 51.46 was reported at Year 2004
Minimum Inflation rate compared to previous year about 4.19 was reached at Year 2005
min_summary: In general Inflation rate compared to previous year has stayed the same over the Year.

Inflation rate compared to previous year is roughly constant from 1996 to 2002, rapidly increasing from 2002 to 2003, slightly decreasing from 2003 to 2004, slightly increasing from 2004 to 2005, and finally roughly constant from 2005 to 2007.

max_summary: Overall Inflation rate compared to previous year has increased over the Year.

Inflation rate compared to previous year is roughly constant from 1996 to 2002, rapidly increasing from 2002 to 2003, slightly decreasing from 2003 to 2004, slightly increasing from 2004 to 2005, and finally roughly constant from 2005 to 2007.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2004 and 2005.
Maximum Inflation rate compared to previous year, about 51.46 was reported at Year 2004
Minimum Inflation rate compared to previous year about 4.19 was reached at Year 2005

The line significantly increased by 22.23 from Year 2002 to 2003,increased by 24.01 from Year 2003 to 2004,decreased by 47.27 from Year 2004 to 2005, and lastly, increased by 3.38 from Year 2005 to 2006.
